p: The percentages of transduced GFP-positive T cells, CD19 on leukemia cells, T cell phenotypes of the patient were determined by flow cytometry. The antibodies for CD3 (APC), CD4 (Percp-cy5.5), CD8 (PE), CD19 (APC), CD20 (PE), and CD22 (Percp-cy5.5) were used. The flow cytometry was performed with a FACSCalibur flow cytometer (BD Biosciences) and analyzed using FlowJo software.
